main_definition: A printed publication containing news, information, and advertising, usually issued daily or weekly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A source of current local, national, and international news and events.
meanings_and_examples.example: I read the newspaper to stay updated on the latest happenings in my city.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of purchasing or obtaining a physical copy of printed news.
meanings_and_examples.example: Every morning, she buys a newspaper from her local vendor to read over breakfast.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A medium for advertising products and services. Advertisements are often included in newspapers along with the news articles.
meanings_and_examples.example: The car dealership placed an ad in the Sunday edition of the newspaper, hoping to attract customers on their weekend.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A printed sheet containing a variety of written content, including editorials, comics, and puzzles.
meanings_and_examples.example: Aside from news articles, newspapers often feature crossword puzzles or horoscopes for entertainment.
